body: LIST STU NM ID GR IF $1

Keep Students.description: Keep students based on a condition

body: LIST STU SEC TCH STU.NM TCH.TE SEC.CN IF SEC.CN = $1
Section/Teacher Join.description: Join Students to Sections and Teachers

body: LABELS STU NM AD CY ST ZP IF $1

Field Description.description: Appends the description operator to a field
